column1: #Text=" Iroh says : " With a solid stance , you are a much more serious threat .
#Text=But to tell you the truth , you do not look like the criminal type .
#Text=" Tycho says : " So you really think I could be a good masseur ?
#Text=" Tycho says : " This is so great .
#Text=No one has ever believed in me .
#Text=" Iroh says : " While it is always best to believe in oneself , a little help from others can be a great blessing .
